typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Air_ID as string,
		Airline as string,
		Year as string,
		Region as string,
		Revenue as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source1 split(Airline=='A1',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Airline1, Airline2)
